channel.title: Additem(Starter kit, help);
channel.description: I need help. I'm making it so when you [b]first[/b] log in you get these items. How do I make it so you only get them one time. I've tried loads of ways but it doesn't work, it adds them everytime I log in.

item.title: Additem(Starter kit, help);
item.dc:creator: @Violence41 Violence41
item.description:
@Violence41 wrote:

I need help. I’m making it so when you first log in you get these items. How do I make it so you only get them one time. I’ve tried loads of ways but it doesn’t work, it adds them everytime I log in.

Read full topic
